snippet: Seeking to address criticism of its privacy practices, Facebook said it was expanding its downloadable archive feature, called Download Your Information, to provide greater transparency on the types of personal data the company stores.
abstract: Seeking to address criticism of its privacy practices, Facebook said it was expanding its downloadable archive feature, called Download Your Information, to provide greater transparency on the types of personal data the company stores.

headline.main: Facebook Offers More Disclosure to Users
